This version starts with all deck unlocked. I heard theta's one doesn't.

If you are having .dll problems reinstall/upgrade Microsoft direct x end user runtime. After that if you are still having .dll problems reinstall/upgrade microsoft C++ redistributable. Also, you need to have steam installed and running logged into your steam account.

Galera para vcs que estão com problemas para passar a linguagem para portugues, segue a solução(tb versão Skidrow):
- Vá no editor de registro do windows.
- HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWizar... of the CoastMagic The Gathering Duels of the Planeswalkers 2013
- 2 Cliques em language e altere o valor para 8.
- Pronto inicialize o jogo e tamram totalmente portugues do brasil.

Passar a linguagem para portugues:
- Vá no editor de registro do windows.
- HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWizar... of the CoastMagic The Gathering Duels of the Planeswalkers 2013
- 2 Cliques em language e altere o valor para 8.
- Pronto inicialize o jogo e tamram totalmente portugues do brasil.
